title: Got to love all those dodges
body: I am really really sick and tired of all these random dodges, i barely get 2 hours to play LoL and ranked which takes about 10 min to get into game anyways and it just really puts me off when I have to go through 7 dodges were game until 10 people decide they actually want to play the damn game

replies.body: I just posted something like this, Its getting bad. was in 7 rooms finally got into a game where my duo got autofilled, no biggie, then it was a remake. super frustrating, I just wanted to get in a couple games before work. but due to dodgers I had enough time to play one and rant on the boards for a bit
try 12 lobbies then you get into game only to have a mid afk a few minutes in....
